description: Professional Life Science & Research equipment and supplies available in Dubai, UAE from MaxMed. We specialize in high-quality Life Science & Research for laboratories, hospitals, research institutions, and healthcare facilities across the Middle East. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Life Science & Research in the United Arab Emirates. We serve hospitals, research laboratories, universities, and medical facilities throughout Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and the entire UAE region. Our Life Science & Research products meet international quality standards and come with comprehensive support services including installation, training, and maintenance. Contact MaxMed at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and same-day quotes.
